channel.title: God shields
channel.description:
Currently working on bandos armadyl and saradomin any advice or ideas would be good [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj297/scootydd/zamorakgodshieldmqo.jpg[/img] Post your views please Made from scratch btw
If anybody wants it releasing just ask and ill resize and position ready for you mopar
ok here is Armadyl took me about 3 hours to do has way over 1000 faces in it and i think it look spretty good will go with armadyl armour too any ideas for it will be very helpfull as it looks a little plain atm only my 3rd model so be nice please [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj297/scootydd/armadyl.jpg[/img]
This is the bandos one im making going to be basically like this in three segments getting bigger with spikes along the top one colours and things will be better to [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj297/scootydd/earlybandos.jpg[/img] Made the spikes myself btw took for ever

@scootydd wrote:

Ok bandos is working out pretty impossible to make look good with tools i have on metasequoia so im gona change the style to make sure it looks awesome.

item.title: God shields
item.dc:creator: @scootydd scootydd
item.description:
@scootydd wrote:

For the bandos one I will use the exact mats the chest plate shoulder bit uses the bit you see of bandos is the smallest of three segments all over lapping and it will have bandos’s sign on it there will be spikes along the top iv drew this out irl and it will look epic. I will scratches and dents in and break a few spikes thanks for the idea.

Read full topic

item.title: God shields
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

dorkinator:

Bandos should have some cracks and chips in it since he is a warrish god.

Notice the bandos shield is still in progress. The picture there is acually a 2d/3d model. The acual shield is 2d still but he has the spikes on it making it partially 3d.

Read full topic

item.title: God shields
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

In all honestly, the Zamorak one looks epic, the Armadyl is OK I guess but the Bandos just looks like a pancake with knifes sticking out of it, it’s too long so that needs scaling down, and the colours don’t go too well, tried using real Bandos colours and maybe try adding the Bandos symbol instead of the spikes, or have the spikes around the edge, not too many just one or two.

Read full topic

item.title: God shields
item.dc:creator: @scootydd scootydd
item.description:
@scootydd wrote:

Seriously you find that shield or those spikes ill give you $10000 i spent most of today working on them from scratch i did spikes through make lots of circles and joining them up after rotating everything you see is completely mine[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2009, 03:58:36 pm[/size][hr]i could send you files with my spikes about as tall as the jad cuz thats the size i made it to begin with

Read full topic

item.description:

the zamorak shield is a runescape model… just finding it now. and the bandos one those i know are not your spikes as they are the sipeks of of bandos armour and the berserker shield… dont take credit for something you didnt make.

Buddy
